Final year project – Design and develop a car and caravan combo that combines the 
benefit s of the motorhome and the touring caravan industries.  
• An in -depth design process was used that included ideation, 
conceptualisation, and client meetings to ensure that all specification 
requirements were met.  
• Prototypes were created to ensure size and  shapes were attractive and met 
the requirements, a variety of prototypes were made out of sand, clay, wood 
and foam (CNC router)  
• CAD modelling was very important throughout the project to visualise the 
design and show how everything worked, the packages  he used for this were 
Alias Automotive, Solid Edge, Showcase, Falcon, and the adobe suite.  
• A 1/10th scale model of the project was made using a variety of methods 
including rapid prototyping, 3D printing, and woodwork, these were then all 
brought togethe r to be built and painted.
